channel.title: Damn, RuneScape is getting good
channel.description:
I was looking at all the new and future updates in runecape. I noticed that the animation and gameplay is getting better each month, i mean look at the new zaros gwd minigame. and the wilderness and free trade coming back?
The games getting pretty fucking good, what's your guys opinions?

item.title: Damn, RuneScape is getting good
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin

[quote=“mursanari, post:52, topic:378251”]^sais the kid with the rotating head as his pic,
I was crackin’ a joke you bloody drongo…[/quote]

item.title: Damn, RuneScape is getting good
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Doesn’t matter, there’s still going to be the new retarded items

  • the ANNOYING GRAPHICS

I HATE THE NEW GRAPHICS GETS ME SO MAD I DON’T EVEN WANT TO PLAY

I mean really. They should have option to go back to older RS2 graphics (499 plz) so my eyes don’t bleed everytime I get online

Every game that has those cheesy looking graphics (DirectX idiocy) just looks like WoW which has to have been the WORST GAME to ever exist

My eyes start bleeding because of Jagex trying to make RS like other games, NVM back when they first did the gfx updates, that made me puke, but these new new ones give me headaches (literally) and my eyes start twitching when I’m playing and I even set the graphics to lowest possible settings so it looks like 500-550 (or something like that) on LD.

I loved the chunky blockish kind of look. It made the game special. Just like Minecraft. If they updated MC graphics I would quit because they look fine how they are now. We don’t need games that look like real life unless they’re shooter games.

Read full topic

[quote=“cdoggy, post:46, topic:378251”][quote]successful thread is successful
i will now be accepting cash[/quote]
I laugh[/quote]

They’re not only updating RS to please the community. You must be retarded if that’s what you believe, sir.

item.title: Damn, RuneScape is getting good
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“cdoggy, post:46, topic:378251”][quote]successful thread is successful
i will now be accepting cash[/quote]

Yeah… no.

I laugh because no one can simply accept whats going on. They have to come up with some ridiculous theory as to how Jagex is trying to make more money or piss everyone off. Honestly their simply listening to their players for once. Nothing they do will satisfy everyone, nor will it fix every problem. Just accept what their doing and stop complaining lol. If you don’t like it play another game.

Want a cookie? Too bad.[/quote]
no.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn, RuneScape is getting good
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:43, topic:378251”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=474126.msg3475656#msg3475656 date=1295677005]

I’d like to see how the GE would work though. After removing min/max prices, will the search be for the exact amount as well? I find it unlikely a player will be selling at the exact amount of gp I’m selling at. I think they would make it more along the lines of an auction or at least a system where you can put your offer up and search for other offers and see the prices they’d like to buy/sell for.

i can already see people getting scammed by doing this:

People sell something in the ge
Recommended price:
5000000

Scammer puts in price for sale as
50000000

Victim puts an extra zero

50000000

Scammer makes 45m doing nothing.

You know, if they actually had 50m in their invent, maybe they are planning on getting something with the 50m, and that happens

They’d probably add a little “are you sure” message before you purchase an item over 10m

mebe

knowing jagex… they will let a few ppl get pwnt first, THEN do that.

Or if you buy an item for over 20% of the recommended price, it will come up.

Also, have the recommended price shown near the actual price sold at, so you can see both and know whether he is selling legit/scamming? Like,
Recommended Price: 500000
Actual Selling Price: 5000000
I don’t know about you, but I think it’s pretty obvious which one is bigger.

remember… there are tons of 9 year olds that play rs… and when that happens to them… they come here…
[/quote]
+1 for the 9 year old deterrent[/quote]
its true and you know it

Read full topic

item.title: Damn, RuneScape is getting good
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Jc22493:

Although I love the GE, I also enjoyed the “bartering system” to get what I needed, if you know what I mean.

Oh you mean scamming the noobs into selling coal for half price then scamming other noobs into buying it for 10x the original price?
Yeah I miss that too.

Read full topic
